name: unSurvey
headline: AI-led market research interviews, no scheduling, instant insights.

founders.name: Andrej Zukov-Gregoric, Founder
founders.description:
Running unSurvey (W21) -- previously Corrily (W21).

In my past life, spent time at BlackRock working as a quant, did a PhD in NLP, and too many other eclectic other things to mention.

![Logo 2](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo-mindee.92a71b56.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Logo 3](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsynthesized.32dbd254.png&w=1200&q=75)
![Logo 4](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ftbi-bank.d596181b.png&w=3840&q=75)
![Logo 5](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ftab.297f9b20.png&w=640&q=75)
![Logo 6](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogo-kpmg.11e694f8.png&w=1200&q=75)
## How it works
![](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fflow1.dd1027e7.png&w=1080&q=75)
### AI-curated conversation flows
Describe your conversation in natural language, and let our AI design a flow for you
![](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fflow2.b9a7d4ea.png&w=1080&q=75)
### Powerful no-code conversational flow editor
Easily drag and drop topics and add logic using natural language
![](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fflow3.3bf094e7.png&w=1080&q=75)
### Dynamic, human-like voice, video and text conversations in 50+ languages
Engage the participants in their preferred language and modality
![](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fflow4.4b2d8dd0.png&w=1080&q=75)
### Raw transcripts, summaries and keyword identification
Listen or read entire transcripts, or jump straight to summaries and key moments
![](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fflow5.2db744df.png&w=1080&q=75)
### Conversational Insights with deep-linked citations
Get real-time reports that combine both qualitative and quantitative insights
![](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fflow6.2aea64a7.png&w=1080&q=75)
### Structured data extraction and vizualization
Download clean, structured data extracted automatically from each conversation, along with pre-built visualizations
![](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fflow7.3d288c43.png&w=1080&q=75)
### Participation access controls and invitation flows
Control who can participate in the conversation - make it anonymous or invite specific contacts
[Get started for free](http://www.unsurvey.ai/</create>)
## 50x Faster, 95% Cheaper Customer Research
### Make collecting information fun
Say goodbye to annoying forms. Say hello to conversational experiences that are dead simple for respondents and help you understand sentiment and other emotional cues.
Chat
Video
Phone
### Human-like interviews
Ask follow-up questions, probe for more detail, and clarify responses just like a human interviewer.
### Panel integration
Let us manage your panel and expand it through our global panel partners
### Multi-lingual
No need to translate your surveys. We speak most of the world's languages already.
### Built-in stimuli
Include images, videos, websites, or Figma prototypes respondents can see and interact with.
### Personalization
Personalize each respondent's experience based on profile data or previous survey responses.
### The basics too
Yes, we also offer things that most surveys do, like typed responses and closed choice questions.
![WhatsApp](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fwhatsapp.6f8f1134.jpg&w=128&q=75)
![Slack](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fslack.22197d99.jpg&w=128&q=75)
![Jira](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fjira.cea14897.jpg&w=128&q=75)
![Salesforce](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsalesforce.3b17cadd.jpg&w=128&q=75)
![Intercom](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fintercom.623004bf.jpg&w=128&q=75)
## 7k+ Integrations to Automate Your Workflows
Automatically trigger an unSurvey based on events and actions in other apps and send unSurvey data back to them.
![Asana](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fasana.10a2385f.jpg&w=128&q=75)
![Zoom](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fzoom.272b68a9.jpg&w=128&q=75)
![Gmail](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fgmail.62ee2111.jpg&w=128&q=75)
![Zapier](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fzapier.52ec9d8c.jpg&w=128&q=75)
![Shopify](http://www.unsurvey.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fshopify.4ccaf9b8.jpg&w=128&q=75)
## Loved by Respondents
"unSurvey feels like a real conversation. The AI truly understands my responses and asks meaningful follow-up questions."
"I’ve never experienced a survey tool that genuinely listens haha!"
"The interaction felt so personalized. It was clear that unSurvey was adapting to my answers in real-time."

generated_description:
**unSurvey: Revolutionizing Market Research with AI**

Founded in 2021 and nestled in the heart of San Francisco, unSurvey is on a mission to transform the way businesses conduct market research interviews. The company, a proud member of the Y Combinator Batch W21, leverages AI to provide instant insights without the hassle of traditional scheduling. This approach not only streamlines the process but also makes collecting customer feedback significantly faster and cheaper—imagine gathering actionable insights in mere hours rather than months.

### The Promise of AI-Curated Research

At its core, unSurvey offers an incredibly intuitive platform that enables users to initiate AI-driven conversations with their target audience. With a compact team of eight under the guidance of Group Partner Aaron Epstein, the company stands out in its ability to reimagine what customer research can look like. Here's how it works:

1. **AI-Curated Conversation Flows**: Businesses can describe what they want to discuss in simple terms, and unSurvey’s AI will craft the conversation flow.
2. **No-Code Interface**: Users can easily manipulate discussion topics and logic through a drag-and-drop interface, making complex setups accessible for everyone.
3. **Multi-Language Support**: The platform supports conversations in over 50 languages, ensuring inclusivity and accessibility.
4. **Dynamic Engagement**: AI facilitates human-like interactions through voice, video, or text, adapting based on participant responses.
5. **Powerful Insights**: Alongside raw transcripts, users receive summarized insights and structured data visualization, making analysis straightforward.

### A Better Experience for Everyone

What unSurvey offers isn’t just about speed; it’s also about creating a genuine experience for respondents. Traditional survey forms can feel bland and unengaging, but unSurvey transforms data collection into real conversations. Users report feeling like they are genuinely heard, elevating the quality of feedback received.

The platform seamlessly integrates with over 7,000 different applications, meaning teams can trigger research automatically based on user actions in other tools like Salesforce, Slack, and Zoom. 

### A Glimpse Ahead

With a commitment to innovation, unSurvey continues to refine its features, ensuring that insights not only come faster but are also richer and more actionable. Whether you’re a small startup or a large enterprise, unSurvey has positioned itself as a critical tool for modern market research. If you're looking to step beyond traditional feedback methods, jump into this AI-driven world where insights await at the speed of conversation.

For those curious to explore this platform, unSurvey offers a free trial, making it simple for any interested party to begin reaping the benefits of smarter market research.

For more information, visit their website: [unSurvey.ai](http://www.unsurvey.ai) or reach out via email at hello@unsurvey.ai.
